item.title: Ukrainian Army Faces Shortage, Brazil Coup Details
item.description: The Ukrainian army is experiencing a shortage of soldiers, and details of a coup plan in Brazil have been revealed.

item.title: EU Imposes 15th Sanctions Package on Russia
item.description: Brussels targets Kremlin's shadow fleet, arms industry, Chinese subsidiaries, and Putin's inner circle with new sanctions.

item.title: UK Labour Government Speeds Up Illegal Immigrant Deportations
item.description: The new Labour government in the UK is increasing deportations of illegal immigrants and allocating more resources to combat illegal immigration.

item.title: Poland and France Unite for Ukraine's Peace
item.description: Polish PM and French President discuss European security, Ukraine support, and strengthening bilateral ties.

item.title: Russian Intelligence Chief's Global Perspective
item.description: Sergei Naryshkin, head of Russia's SVR, shares his vision of the world, hinting at Russia's future policy directions.

item.title: Czech Delegation Explores Korean Artillery and Energy
item.description: A Czech delegation visited South Korea to explore artillery and energy technologies, including modular nuclear reactors, for potential cooperation.

item.title: Russia Warns on US Missile Base in Poland
item.description: Russia has expressed concerns about a US missile defense base in Poland, signaling potential geopolitical tensions.

item.title: V4 Presidents Meet on Security
item.description: The presidents of the Visegrad Group (V4) countries are set to discuss regional and international security issues.
